name: Zany Touch
description:
Test your reflexes against faster and faster challenges. Listen for the instruction and do it as fast as you can -- touch, swipe up, swipe down, swipe left, swipe right, shake, pinch, and two finger touch. A pulsing sound track keeps the game moving. How many levels can you make it past? 100? 200? 300?

A simple, yet challenging game for all ages. Easy to play and addictive! The whole family can play against each other.

Features Multiplayer mode for up to four players through Apple Game Center.

Game Lives give players a chance to make higher scores by allowing up to two mistakes before the game ends. Extra Game Life Packs available through in-app purchase.

With Apple Game Center you can share your score with friends and see your rank in the leaderboards. Earn up to 40 different achievements.

Includes voice and visual prompts so you can play with the sound off.

FEATURES:

Three difficulty settings: Easy, Medium, and Hard.

Easy level uses three gestures. Medium level uses five. Hard level uses all eight.

Fully customizable practice mode.

Tracks high scores and previous scores for each difficulty setting on the device.

Post score badges to social media.

Post scores and check your rankings with Apple Game Center leaderboards and achievements.

Fully integrated with VoiceOver to make this a great game for the blind and visually impaired.
